section.name: Embedding the Pluto 2.0 Container
section.p: To embed the Pluto container in your portal or development environment, you will need the following jar files...

Shared Lib: Copy the following to <TOMCAT_HOME>/shared/lib:
portlet-api-2.0.jar
ccpp-1.0.jar (Pluto 2.0 only)
pluto-container-api-2.0.0.jar (or the build version of Pluto you are using)
pluto-taglib-2.0.0.jar (or the build version of Pluto you are using)

Implementation: Copy into your portal implementation such as WEB-INF/lib:
commons-logging-1.1.jar
commons-logging-api-1.1.jar
jaxb-api-2.1.jar
jaxb-impl-2.1.8.jar
pluto-container-2.0.0.jar (or the build version of Pluto you are using)
stax-api-1.0.1.jar
stax-1.2.0.jar
